name: logdy
tagline: A platform for real time log collection and analysis
description: Logdy Core is a platform for collecting and analyzing logs in real-time from distributed systems. It features streaming dashboards, filterable views, and storage that works in both cloud and self-hosted environments.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Streaming dashboards, Live updates, Instant visibility. Monitor logs as they happen

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Advanced filters, Full-text search, Query builder. Find relevant logs quickly

features.title: Distributed Systems
features.description: Multi-source collection, Centralized view, Scalable architecture. Handle logs from anywhere

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Cloud or self-hosted, Docker support, Easy setup. Deploy where you need it
